instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message:
I have two of these boards now with the same issues. They crash about 25% into booting. If trackpad is disconnected they will boot fine.  
tried both in good cases and they still fail to boot. 
Ive seen older posts about this but they weren’t resolved.

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message:
They both restart. 15 seconds. 
Yes good battery.

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message: Did you test without U4850 first?

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message: I misunderstood. Just tried and still does the same with u4850 left off.

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message:
Try starting Apple Diagnostic mode.
See if any error pops up.

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message: Diagnostics won’t run. I can select a language and agree but the progress bar never comes up and the courser freezes.

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message: The other Mac allowed me to run diag. Came back no issues.

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message:
Try another battery, tested in other machine for sure.
Also try starting in safe mode.

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message:
Out of other batteries. Used last one I used was working with another machine. 
safe mode doesn’t work.

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message: Ordered an aftermarket battery. If that was the issue would an aftermarket battery even resolve it?

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message: Always good to have old original batteries in stock, just for test.

threads.title: 820-00426 fails to boot with trackpad connected
threads.message:
So another new battery and both boards booted no problem. Strangely, I put them back in their original cases and they worked with those batteries now. 

The trackpad threw me off with these. That and I had to go through 3 ‘good’ batteries to make it work.
